data.title: Send an email to hostmaster@lunatech.com
data.detail: Send an email to hostmaster@lunatech.com with a picture of the setup screen of your MacBook and be sure to include the serial number (apple menu â†’ about this Mac)

data.detail: Clean and reset your MacBook before handing it in

data.title: Hand in keys, laptop, travel card, and your locker key
data.detail: Hand in keys, laptop, travel card, and your locker key if you had one, and all other accessories such as keyboard, mouse, ghost stand etc.
